table.name: vtiger_packageservices
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_packageservices` ( `packageservicesid` int(19) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `packageservicesno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `double_room` varchar(3) DEFAULT '0', `one_room` varchar(3) DEFAULT '0', `trip_service` varchar(3) DEFAULT '0', `vegetarian_meal` varchar(3) DEFAULT '0', `transfer_service` varchar(3) DEFAULT '0', `visa_service` varchar(3) DEFAULT '0', `insurance_service` varchar(3) DEFAULT '0', `additional_bed` varchar(3) DEFAULT '0', `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`packageservicesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_packageservicescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_packageservicescf` ( `packageservicesid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`packageservicesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
